mapper.insert: insert into tbl_dongnews(dnewsId, dnewsTitle, dnewsDepartment, dnewsTel, dnewsContent, memId) values(seq_dongnews.nextval, #{dnewsTitle}, #{dnewsDepartment}, #{dnewsTel}, #{dnewsContent}, #{memId})
mapper.update: update tbl_dongnews set dnewsCount = dnewsCount + 1 where dnewsId = #{dnewsId}
